author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
Our ceremony implementation: https://dknopik.de/
It's written in golang and does (most) of the necessary checks.
We might rewrite the client in rust and try to compile that to WASM in the future.
The big thing missing is DOS protection of the coordinator.
We thought about sign-in with ethereum/oauth.
Small things missing: the participant needs to store its PK for verifying the transcript, we didn't put together a verifier for the transcript yet, the coordinator should sign some message attesting that the participant contributed, the timeouts are very generous (~1 min 30 per round)
LMK if you have some feedback

content: Do you think it can be compiled to WASM with TinyGo? It could be a nice alternative to a rust rewrite
